book.title: Sherlock Holmes
book.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
book.description: This story is about one of the greatest detectives of our time, written by his friend and partner.A resident of an unsightly house on Baker Street solves the most difficult cases one by one, easily transforms into bandits, booksellers, chimney sweeps...Yes, several times Sherlock is on the brink of death. But how can death defeat the Great Investigator? Never! Especially if ahead - eternity. Eternal life in the hearts of millions and millions of readers who will never forget either the Reichenbach Falls, or the stupid Inspector Lestrade, or the faithful Watson, or the house on Baker Street ...
